text: (nabiye!) obata pera (pæmi‚ apage) dutayin bohomayak denada (me andamatama) niyata vasayenma samaccalayata lak karanu læbuha. (ovunva) pratiksepa kala ayavada (evelema danduvam nokara) ma kal di athæra dæmuvemi. ehet pasuva ma ovunva alla gattemi. (apage) danduvama kese tibuneda (yanna sita balanu mænava)
